==Description==
Holds all the image sizes. Not only the given sizes '''"thumbnail", "medium", "large" and "full"''' but also all image sizes registered with [[Function_Reference/add_image_size|add_image_size()]]

== Source File ==

<tt>intermediate_image_sizes</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/media.php}}.<br/>
<tt>add_image_size()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-admin/includes/image.php}}.
